channel.title: Comments on: Whee for Wii 2!
channel.description: Tech news worth talking about and tech help worth listening to

item.title: By: David Ahn
item.dc:creator: David Ahn
item.description: I'd have to agree with you on that one Ray, they won't be releasing it for another year at the earliest!
item.content:encoded: I’d have to agree with you on that one Ray, they won’t be releasing it for another year at the earliest!

item.title: By: Ray Hollister
item.dc:creator: Ray Hollister
item.description: That was an interesting way for them to announce it. However, I honestly prefer Apple's approach to product announcements better. Don't tell me anything about what you are gonna sell until you are ready to start selling it.
item.content:encoded: That was an interesting way for them to announce it. However, I honestly prefer Apple’s approach to product announcements better. Don’t tell me anything about what you are gonna sell until you are ready to start selling it.
